Text: I would just like to point out that this is a great movie :)
actually one of my favorites.  its really funny.
Oh, and congrats for the pink skull :)
Thanks. I suppose it's better than nothing. Still got the bloody captchas tho.

Glad to see you and -jonny- with skulls again.

What's the scoop on the whole deal? Will the person responsible for this madness be held accountable?

thanxx...
hope u get back ur VIP status back soon...:)

Thank you uploader. However, not sure why this was saved as a .mkv file. To my understanding, .mkv files are containers for multiple audio and subtitles. There is only one audio and no subtitles within this file.

For those that care, you can simply change the file extension from .mkv to .mp4 with no loss of quality. Again, thank you uploader.
